str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From kolla; to glue, i.e. to stick.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Dionysius, an Athenian. From Dionusos; reveller; Dionysius, an Athenian.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From Areios Pagos; an Areopagite or member of the court held on Mars' Hill.
A woman, wife, my lady. Probably from the base of ginomai; a woman; specially, a wife.
Name, character, fame, reputation. From a presumed derivative of the base of ginosko; a 'name'.
Damaris, an Athenian woman. Probably from the base of damazo; perhaps gentle; Damaris, an Athenian woman.
(a) of two: another, a second, (b) other, different, (c) one's neighbor. Of uncertain affinity; other or different.
With. A primary preposition denoting union; with or together.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
